name: lmdb-store
author: Kris Zyp
description: Simple, efficient, scalable data store wrapper for LMDB

scripts.prebuild: prebuildify --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --target 16.9.0 && prebuildify --target 15.5.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.17.0 && prebuildify --target electron@15.2.0
scripts.before-publish: prebuildify-ci download && prebuildify --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --target 16.9.0 && prebuildify --target 15.5.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.17.0 && prebuildify --target electron@15.2.0
scripts.recompile: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -d
